meanings.definition: A rare nickel arsenide sulfide mineral with formula (Ni,Co)AsS.
meanings.english_definition: A rare nickel arsenide sulfide mineral with formula (Ni,Co)AsS.

examples.sentence: Glaucodote is an opaque, grayish-white to tin-white orthorhombic mineral.
examples.translation: 緑コバルトニッケル鉱は不透明で、灰色がかった白色から錫白色の斜方晶系の鉱物です。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek γλαυκός (glaukós, “grayish-blue, pale green”) +‎ -dote.
